_header: Welcome Edward our son of high degree
Title(s): ‘The Receyvyng of Kyng Edward the IIIJth at Brystowe’
Subjects: Edward IV; occasional verse; historical poems
_description: ‘The Receyvyng of Kyng Edward the IIIJth at Brystowe’ — one quatrain

Lam306.Transcription:
Well come Edwarde oure son of high degreeMany yeeris hast þu
                    lakkyd owte of this londeI am thy fore fader Wylliam of normandyeTo
                    see thy Welefare here thrugh goddys sond
Lam306.Attributed Title:
The receyvyng of kyng Edward the iiijth at Brystowe ffirst atte
                    the comyng ynne atte temple gate there stode Wylliam conquerour with iij lordis
                    and these were his wordis (f. 132, rubric)
